species_year_wide <- move_data_joined %>%
  mutate(year=year(timestamp)) %>%
  group_by(species,year) %>%
  summarize(num_birds=n_distinct(ID)) %>%
   pivot_wider(names_from = year,
    values_from = num_birds,
    values_fill = 0) %>%
   arrange(year)
